overview: Eight months after meeting Ulysses in Rio, Pascale decided to bring him to Paris. The plane ticket Ulysses receives takes him to Europe. When he arrived at Roissy airport, he was welcomed with open arms by Pascale, who was determined to win him back. Ulysses, if he is indeed seduced by Pascale's attitude, is nevertheless less inflamed than she is.
title: Lamento
